= Deployment Database =

== Overview ==

The original Deployment Database (DDB) is an MS-Access database which contains information about all deployments, instruments, personnel and sites for a specific location. Other specific-user database can be used if a [#interface_requirements minimum interface requirements] are met.

In the toolbox, the `DDB/executeDDBQuery` function acts as a wrapper around the DDB, and returns query results as vectors of matlab structs. This means that no conversion between Java-Matlab types is necessary.

== MS-Access Schema ==

The complete MS-Access DDB schema is shown below:

http://imos-toolbox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/ddb_schema.png

== Interface requirements ==

The following subsections detail the tables and fields which are used by the toolbox. 
 * All of these tables and fields must be present
 * Table and field names must be identical (case sensitive)
 * Field types must be identical/compatible
